codeGet:
select * from (select p.id as id, p.CONSTANT_NAME AS NAME,nvl(p.PAGE_OWNER,' ') as TYPE_OWNER , p.PAGE_ALLOW_ALL_IND as ALLOW_MODIFY FROM SSPBMGR.PAGE p  
where 'P'=:type and nvl(p.PAGE_OWNER,' ') = decode(:owner,'',nvl(p.PAGE_OWNER,' '),:owner)
union
select id as id, SERVICE_NAME as NAME, nvl(VIRTUAL_DOMAIN_OWNER,' ') AS TYPE_OWNER  , VIRTUAL_DOMAIN_ALLOW_ALL_IND as ALLOW_MODIFY from virtual_domain
where 'V'=:type and nvl(VIRTUAL_DOMAIN_OWNER,' ')  like decode(:owner,'',nvl(VIRTUAL_DOMAIN_OWNER,' '),:owner)
union
select id as id, CONSTANT_NAME AS NAME,nvl(CSS_OWNER,' ') AS TYPE_OWNER, CSS_ALLOW_ALL_IND as ALLOW_MODIFY from css 
where 'C'=:type  and nvl(CSS_OWNER,' ') = decode(:owner,'',nvl(CSS_OWNER,' '),:owner)
) order by name
